emerging_markets.snippet: The cooling trend could reassure Turkey's central bank, which held its key rate in May after hiking it in April.

emerging_markets.title: India's defense stocks still have room to run, says analyst
emerging_markets.snippet: Arun Leslie John, Chief Market Analyst at Century Financial says India has more scope to increase defense spending, which will in turn fuel demand for stocks in the sector.

emerging_markets.title: International And Emerging Markets Starting To Percolate: 10- And 15-Year Annual Returns Still Modest
emerging_markets.snippet: International equities (and even bonds, for that matter) have had a good 2025 so far this year. Emerging markets are possibly starting to show some forward progress.
